information.bccRewardsMobileDesc: Four-phase BCC release system based on member activation milestones. Each phase has different reward amounts that decrease over time.
information.bccRewardsSystemDesc: Four-phase BCC release system based on member activation milestones. Rewards decrease progressively to ensure long-term sustainability.
information.condition1: Members in layers upgrade membership levels
information.condition2: Trigger corresponding rewards based on upgrade level
information.condition3: Each layer can receive multiple rewards
information.layerRewardsDialogDesc: Comprehensive explanation of the 19-layer reward system, including eligibility rules and payout mechanisms
information.layerRewardsMobileDesc: When members in your matrix upgrade membership levels, corresponding layer rewards are triggered. 19 layers total, each layer reward amount is 100% of the corresponding level NFT price.
information.layerRewardsSystemDesc: Layer rewards are triggered by member upgrades in your downline. Layer 1 rewards are based on direct referrals but display through matrix hierarchy. Layers 2-19 follow standard matrix placement with recursive tree view up to 19 levels.
information.matrixPrincipleDesc: BEEHIVE uses a 19-layer 3×3 matrix system, with each level representing one layer in the matrix.
information.bccLockingRewardsDesc: Four-phase BCC token release system based on global member activation count
information.bccReleaseMechanismDesc: BCC tokens are automatically released when members activate any level, with amounts decreasing across four phases
information.referrerLevelInsufficient: Referrer level insufficient for instant claim
information.canClaimByUpgrading: Can claim by upgrading to required level

information.upgradeToClainDesc: Members can upgrade during pending period to claim immediately
information.expiredReallocationDesc: System automatically redistributes expired rewards to qualified upline members
information.pending72HoursDesc: If referrer level insufficient, reward enters 72-hour pending state

information.canClaimByUpgrading: 可通過升級到所需級別來領取
information.rollsUpToQualified: 回滚给下一個合格的上級成員
information.ensuresNoRewardLost: 確保系統中没有獎勵丢失
information.noUpgradeRollup: 72小時內未升級 → 回滚给合格上級
information.upgradeToClainDesc: 成員可在待處理期間升級以立即領取
information.expiredReallocationDesc: 系統自動將過期獎勵重新分配给合格的上級成員
information.pending72HoursDesc: 如果推薦者等級不足，獎勵進入72小時待處理狀態

information.phaseProgressionDesc: 隨着会員增长自動推進阶段
information.matrixDescription: 此可視化展示矩阵結構的工作原理。當您層級中的成員升級等級時，將觸發相應的層級獎勵。
information.layerRewardsDescription: 了解當矩阵中的成員升級会員等級時，層級獎勵如何運作。每個層級都有特定的資格要求和獎勵金額。
information.bccRewardsDescription: 了解基于成員激活里程碑的四阶段BCC釋放系統。獎勵逐步遞減以確保长期可持續性。

information.layerRewardsDetailDescription: 19層獎勵系統的全面說明，包括資格規則和支付機製。
information.matrixStructureDesc: 每個級別代表矩阵中的一層。當您層級中的成員升級其会員等級時，將根據升級的等級觸發層級獎勵。
information.triggeredByLevel: 由您第{{layer}}層中的Level {{layer}}升級觸發
information.finalLayerReward: 最终層級獎勵 - 最高收益潜力

information.levelMustBeGreater: 您的等級必須高于層級等級
